description.p: A system settings panel for the Pantheon Desktop that lets you easily and safely customise your desktop's appearance.
专为 Pantheon 设计的系统设置面板，帮助您简便、安全地修改桌面外观。
A system settings panel for the Pantheon Desktop that lets you easily and safely customise your desktop's appearance.
Um painel de definições do sistema para o ambiente de trabalho Pantheon que permite personalizar com facilidade e segurança a aparência do seu ambiente de trabalho.
Panel ustawień systemowych dla pulpitu Pantheon, który pozwala łatwo i bezpiecznie dostosować wygląd pulpitu.
簡単かつ安全にデスクトップの外観をカスタマイズできる、Pantheon デスクトップ向けのシステム設定パネルです。
Egy rendszerbeállítások-komponens a Pantheon számára, amivel egyszerűen és biztonságosan testreszabhatja az asztali felület megjelenését.
Un panneau de configuration système pour le bureau Pantheon qui vous permet de personnaliser facilement et en toute sécurité l’apparence de votre bureau.
Ein Systemeinstellungsmodul für die Arbeitsumgebung »Pantheon«, mit die Erscheinung der Arbeitsumgebung sicher und einfach angepasst werden kann.

ul.li: Remove AnimationsPane which no longer take effect due to the removal of tweaking animations functions on Gala side
DestinationButton: Show an error dialog when creating/opening the destination folder being failed
FontsPane: Fix icon missing with the latest icons update
Make sure dimming feature that is introduced in the latest version of Gala work for the reset dialog
TerminalPane: Support changing tab bar behavior
AppearancePane: Add buttons to open the theme locations
Sync selected elementary stylesheet variant with Desktop Plug
Prevent System Settings from crashing due to the removal of preferences in upstream Videos
Correct cursor and icon theme dir copies
Exclude Adwaita/gnome/hicolor themes from theme selections
Support accessing to panes with settings paths
Make sure the plug works on NixOS (thanks to @bobby285271)

description.p: elementary Tweaks is now renamed to Pantheon Tweaks and get some new features and fixes:

ul.li: Remove preferences now supported in Pantheon officially
Remove preferences causing the plug crash
